ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics
ygData.msgSnippet: If im not mistaken the sharkskin drum icon looks like a lute so you might confuse yourself when equiping it.  Also to note that the nos tamborine has better
ygData.messageBody:
If im not mistaken the sharkskin drum icon looks like a lute so you might
confuse yourself when equiping it. Also to note that the nos tamborine has
better stats. Nos tamborine is easy to get too, just go to dreadlands and
do /auc looking for ancient coins for a week and you'll have your drum (i
did anyways)

Minkin
Annoying Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: January 12, 2001 10:15 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics


I can't wait until I'm high enough...with my water song, the dungeon I'm
waiting I'm in range to do is Kedge Keep. Supposedly empty and good
xp...just sounds too perfect! Besides, I want sharkskin drums. :)
Everyone has MM drums...I wanna be different. Until I can get Selo's drums,
anyway...heh.

Question, though...my group will most likely depend on me to keep breathing.
What should be the actions if I were to go LD? Should they just camp, log
an alt, and wait until I show up? heh...just a thought.

Thanks!
Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Malin [mailto:Thanos0000@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 10:04 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics


From: "Rebecca Small" <rsmall@...>
Subject: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics


> Spent from the high 30s to 50 in KK. I believe strongly this was the
dungeon
> V has alluded to as having the best exp modifier in the game. It better,
the

It certainly was. Not sure about Velious zones yet, but with Kunark in the
picture Kedge ends up 3rd for xp zone modifier behind Howling Stones and
Vesheen's Peek

Underbrush
Level 1 Pathfinder, Knight of Tunare

Reedwind
Level 19 bard
